name: EatWell
description:
Story：
A monster from hell has kidnapped your lover and sucked her blood, and now it's your job to go into the netherworld to save her from the beast.Gameplay：
Collecting bloods cells throughout each stage you can accumulate a variety of weird and wonderful power-ups and abilities to help you defeat whatever the damned throw at you. Be warned, it's not going to be easy.Game features：
  • Accumulate energy to get gain power-ups and new abilities; easy to use, difficult to master
  • Fantastic props
  • Procedurally generated dungeons and catacombs
  • A wide variety of monsters and unique boss battles
  • Hidden areas to discover


Soundtrack by CodeManu, Joth and nene.
Sound design by SubspaceAudio
